content:
hey everyone! need a little help
installed zulip on home machine, when i set SETTING_EXTERNAL_HOST to localhost or my private lan ip, and visit the same in browser can see the zulip login page
the zulip is hosted on localhost:80
Next, i used a tunneling solution https://theboroer.github.io/localtunnel-www/ to access the server from anywhere, and pasted the url from localtunnel to SETTING_EXTERNAL_HOST, but cannot access the zulip server
I think perhaps localtunnel is sending the request to the server using some other domain name, and hence zulip discards the request, since it does not match the url provided by localtunnel
is there a way i can allow all urls in SETTING_EXTERNAL_HOST.. ?
This topic was moved here from #general > issues by Tim Abbott
@Hemant what error do you get?
I would guess the most likely issue would be your not having an SSL certificate for your domain, but it's hard to know without more concrete details.
